metadata.dc:author: Peña, E
Betancourt, C
Berríos, G
metadata.dc:description: A case of primary squamous-cell carcinoma (epidermoid carcinoma) of the colon is presented located in the hepatic flexure. It seems to be the first case registered in Latin America. The pathogenesis, natural history, and treatment of the disease are reviewed.
metadata.dc:title: Carcinoma de células escamosas de colon reporte de un caso.
[Squamous cell carcinoma of the colon. A case report].
